comment: Why Is France No Longer French? Watch: Daniel Conversano and Timoth Vorgenss from Suavelos joins Lana to discuss how France has been transformed by mass immigration. Is France, as we've known it, lost forever?
amr:
# ::snt Why Is France No Longer French? Watch: Daniel Conversano and Timoth Vorgenss from Suavelos joins Lana to discuss how France has been transformed by mass immigration. Is France, as we've known it, lost forever?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "France"))
                  :ARG2 (c3 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "France"))
                  :ARG3 (m2 / more)
                  :time (n3 / no-longer)))
      :snt2 (j / join-04
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Daniel"
                              :op2 "Con Conversano"))
                  :op2 (p2 / person
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "Timoth"
                              :op2 "Vorgenss"))
                  :source (c4 / city
                        :name (n6 / name
                              :op1 "Suavelos")))
            :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :name (n7 / name
                        :op1 "Lana"))
            :purpose (d / discuss-01
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :manner-of (t2 / transform-01
                              :ARG0 (ii / immigrate-01
                                    :manner (m3 / mass))
                              :ARG1 c2))))
      :snt3 (l / lose-02
            :ARG1 (c5 / country
                  :name (n8 / name
                        :op1 "France")
                  :ARG1-of (k / know-02
                        :ARG0 (w / we)))
            :ARG2 (f / forever)
            :polarity a))

comment: You don't have to stereotype a person because they look different then you.
